data.title: Foreign Cinema
data.meta_description: Since 1999. Foreign Cinema remains a magical destination for local, national and international visitors as San Francisco’s most enduring dining centers.
data.text:
Online Reservation

Walk-ins welcome, reservations are encouraged. Reserve a table in our indoor dining room with fireplace and open kitchen, or partially covered outdoor heated courtyard. Film starts at dusk in the outdoor courtyard. Reservations are subject to change due to weather. Reserve up to 60 days in advance.

We can accommodate groups up to 8, duplicate bookings will not be honored. Reservations for 9+ may be booked here.

We will be closed the following services:

Saturday, August 31 (Dinner)

Tuesday, September 3

Tuesday, September 10

Saturday, September 14 (Dinner)

Saturday, September 21 (Dinner)

Thursday, September 26 (Foreign Cinema’s 25th Anniversary Charity Gala – Ticketed Event)

For reservations, please call us at 415-648-7600 with any questions or assistance.

Our Menus

Embark on a culinary journey through the vibrant flavors of Californian-Mediterranean cuisine. Our expertly curated menus, and exquisite selection of wines and spirits are designed to complement the unique experience of dining amidst the enchanting backdrop of our outdoor cinema.Whether you’re drawn to our innovative dinner dishes, delectable desserts, leisurely brunches, or elegant drinks, we offer the perfect setting for any occasion.

Intrigued? Explore our menus and start planning your unforgettable dining experience at Foreign Cinema.

25th Anniversary Charity Gala

Thursday, September 26th from 5-10pm

Jump into Foreign Cinema’s immersive Moulin Rouge-themed 25th anniversary gala with entertainment extraordinaire: live music, electrifying dance, magic and art, with non-stop thematic Parisienne style food, drinks, and cocktails to fill the senses. Entertainment courtesy of Gregangelo’s Velocity Circus.

Tickets on sale now through Eventbrite.

Proceeds to benefit Hamilton Families

Hamilton Families’ mission is to end family homelessness in the San Francisco Bay Area by providing shelter, stability, and supporting the well-being of children experiencing homelessness.
